achievements.label: Under An Appreciable Mental Strain
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I no longer have any idea what is real, and what is not.

achievements.label: The Clock Striketh Twelve
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I honoured my agreement, but I did not have a friend.

achievements.label: I'm Not... *Unhappy*
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I worked. I slaved. I lived a sort of life.

achievements.label: Corner Office
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I will be honoured by my peers. And then, one day, I'll die.

achievements.label: Where Will They Find Me?
achievements.descriptionunlocked: My body died. Perhaps my spirit entered the Mansus.

achievements.label: No Worst, There Is None
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Despair, the wolf that devours thought, devoured me.

achievements.label: Bars Across the Sun
achievements.descriptionunlocked: My trial was contentious. But thanks to the Inspector, here I am.

achievements.label: SUMMON ALIEN GODS
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I conjured a creature from beyond the skin of the world.

achievements.label: In the Midst of my Life, in a Dark Wood
achievements.descriptionunlocked: The Wood grows around the walls of the Mansus. As any student of Histories knows, the Mansus has no walls.

achievements.label: Speechless at Sunset
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Speech may not pass the White Door, but I may.

achievements.label: What Has It Got In Its Pocketses?
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I have answered the riddle of the Stag Door, and am counted among the Know.

achievements.label: Beaded with Blood
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I have made the necessary sacrifice to enter the Mansus through the Spider Door.

achievements.label: In the Glassgarden
achievements.descriptionunlocked: It has pleased the Peacock Door to yield to my entry.

achievements.label: Hairless and Imperishable
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I wrestled the Forge to victory. I will not grow old.

achievements.label: Hairless and Semi-Perishable
achievements.descriptionunlocked: We wrestled the Forge to victory. We will not grow old.

achievements.label: Smooth Without, Red Within
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I gorged on the fruits of the sticky Grail. I will not grow old.

achievements.label: Smooth Without, Dead Within
achievements.descriptionunlocked: We gorged on the fruits of the sticky Grail. We will not grow old.

achievements.label: Thine be the Glory
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I walked behind the Watchman. I will not grow old.

achievements.label: Thine be the Ghoul
achievements.descriptionunlocked: We walked behind the Watchman. We will not grow old.

achievements.label: Breaking Dawn
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I was consumed, but another I rose higher

achievements.label: I, the Feast
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I was devoured, but another I rose higher

achievements.label: The Third Way
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I was lost to another I's glory

achievements.label: The Sun Before Me
achievements.descriptionunlocked: The Sun has his course, and so do I.

achievements.label: A Seer
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I cast a believer onto the Lantern's path.

achievements.label: A Reshaper
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I shaped a mighty believer from the fires of the Forge.

achievements.label: An Assassin
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I sharpened a believer to their deadliest Edge.

achievements.label: A Tarantellist
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I drew a believer to the endless Dance of the Heart.

achievements.label: A Cyprian
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I pledged a believer to the Feast of the Grail.

achievements.label: A Skintwister
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I led a believer to the Wood of the Moth.

achievements.label: A Key
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I forged a believer into a true instrument of Knock.

achievements.label: Mirror of Glory
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I dedicated myself to the understanding of the Light that leaks from a fiercer place.

achievements.label: Unflinching Order
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I dedicated myself to the fire that changes and remakes.

achievements.label: Church of the Bright Edge
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I dedicated myself to the Hours of struggle and conquest.

achievements.label: Children of Silence
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I dedicated myself to the silence that comes and the cold that ends.

achievements.label: Temple Unceasing
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I dedicated myself to the drumbeat which can never end.

achievements.label: Order of the Bloody Cup
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I dedicated myself to the mysteries of birth, blood and appetite.

achievements.label: Wildwood Club
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I dedicated myself to chaos, and the unexpected Hours.

achievements.label: Society of the Holy Wound
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I dedicated myself to the Hours which open doors.

achievements.label: Society of St Hydra
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I dedicated myself to the study of the five Histories, and their thousand demi-real branches.

achievements.label: Ever After: Tristan
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Our flesh may tire. We may grow old. But I will not regret.

achievements.label: Ever After: Valciane
achievements.descriptionunlocked: She wants very much to be found.

achievements.label: Ever After: Laidlaw
achievements.descriptionunlocked: We find, we think, a way.

achievements.label: Ever After: Elridge
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I may give him his reward.

achievements.label: Ever After: Rose
achievements.descriptionunlocked: We seem a suited pair.

achievements.label: Ever After: Victor
achievements.descriptionunlocked: We are happy, I think.

achievements.label: Ever After: Saliba
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I would not say it ended badly.

achievements.label: Ever After: Renira
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I am drunk with her.

achievements.label: Ever After: Violet
achievements.descriptionunlocked: One by one we douse the flames.

achievements.label: Ever After: Auclair
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Now we are scholars of the heart.

achievements.label: Ever After: Enid
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I am well repaid.

achievements.label: Ever After: Neville
achievements.descriptionunlocked: He thanks me afterwards.

achievements.label: Ever After: Cat
achievements.descriptionunlocked: She ensures I have sweet dreams.

achievements.label: Ever After: Clifton
achievements.descriptionunlocked: It is hard to tell, with him, whether to laugh or cry.

achievements.label: Ever After: Slee
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Our home is littered with his notes.

achievements.label: Ever After: Porter
achievements.descriptionunlocked: That is enough.

achievements.label: Ever After: Ysabet
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Our house is home to fluttering things.

achievements.label: Ever After: Sylvia
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Life is not easy with her.

achievements.label: Ever After: Clovette
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Our heartbeats quicken together.

achievements.label: Ever After: Dorothy
achievements.descriptionunlocked: We dream the same pink dreams.

achievements.label: Ever after: Leo
achievements.descriptionunlocked: He is the melody of love, and I hear him now.
